body_html:
I don’t think it’s because the batch size because my image per card is the same in single mode and cluster mode. Also, I cannot increase batch size anymore because it already reached the memory limit.
On Fri, 2 Nov 2018 at 21:43, Bairen Yi ***@***.***> wrote: Try increase your batch size. — You are receiving this because you commented. -- Xiaoning Yue Mail: ustcyue@gmail.com

I don’t think it’s because the batch size because my image per card is the
same in single mode and cluster mode. Also, I cannot increase batch size
anymore because it already reached the memory limit.
